tuv.seg: It pertained to the House of Palmela, that purchased the property in 1840.
Il appartint à la Casa Palmela, qui l'acheta en 1840.
5. The Traditional Weaving Workshop (Largo Vasco da Gama) Weaving is one of this municipality's traditional activities.
5. Außenstelle traditionelle Weberei (Largo Vasco da Gama)
